pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-nacos### 声明> 参考nacos-sdk-python项目改造>> https://github.com/nacos-group/nacos-sdk-python### Usage```pythonfrom nacos import NacosUsageSERVER_ADDRESSES = "127.0.0.1:8848"NAMESPACE = "44b27ac4-60c1-43e7-8ac3-ed34108ca1aa"params = { "servers": SERVER_ADDRESSES, "namespace": NAMESPACE, "service_name": "test.service", # "ip": "127.0.0.1", "port": 8080, "cluster_name": "testCluster", "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {}, "enable": True, "healthy": True, "ephemeral": True,}usage = NacosUsage(debug=False, daemon=False, **params)# 获取配置conf = usage.get_config(data_id="test")print("config: {}".format(conf))# 注册实例usage.register_instance()```
